Title: Relates to the employee status of an individual
Summary: Relates to the employee status of an individual; establishes criteria for determining whether labor or services performed for remuneration qualify as employment.
LawCode: Amd §§511, 160 & 651, Lab L; amd §201, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law and the workers' compensation law, in relation to the employee status of an individual
